ygData.subject: Re: Special Bard Instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: I have the mistmoor drums. I got them off  a castle train when I was about 32. My group was at the zone when we heard TRAIN! CHOO CHOO A COMING THROUGH We
ygData.messageBody:
I have the mistmoor drums. I got them off a castle train when I was about
32. My group was at the zone when we heard "TRAIN! CHOO CHOO A COMING
THROUGH" We saw every imaginable creature at the zone..heh I was charmed
almost immediately and got to watch my friends slice me to bits (grin). Well
they droppped me, they dropped the named gypsy..and they looted and ran.
When I got back they presented me with my very own battledrums. Do I
recommed going after her before your 40?..NO..but if you do..PLEASE use as
much magic resist as possible to save yourself from being charmed! Since mm
castle trains (at least on MY server) are an ever occuring thing, one can
concievabley camp the zone for the gypsy. Harmonic..I know what your
thinking..NO I won't help you get them :) The offer for sol A still stands
though :)

Elyana Silvanae
Bardess of the 36th chorus
Innorruk Server

-->I have been told that a named gypsy NPC drops the battle drum. Don't
have
>one myself but looking forward to it. I have only been in Mistmoore 3-4
>times but on two of those occasions someone was auctioning the battle drum
>for 500PP.
>BTW, one time someone pulled a train of the gypsies to the zone. There
were
>two regular gypsies and the named gypsy. I had just zoned in. There were
>about 10 other players at the zone trying to fight them. People started
>dropping like flies
> That leads me to believe you need a group of 30+ players to
>survive against the gypsies.
>
>Galtin of E'ci
>
